entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:50 a.m. MDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near midnight then blizzard. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
